1121810.name: Electronic Super Joy 2 - Gold Edition
1121810.description:
Support the developer & the musicians, by buying the Gold Edition!

- 3 Bonus levels
- A new ability (The Sky Dagger!)
- A new Boss fight (Derpy Dragon)
- New in-game music tracks!
- Includes full game soundtrack of 43 tracks (OST)
- Bonus EnV Jazz track
- HD digital posters (3 of them!)
- In-development GIFs, screenshots
- Behind the scenes developer sketches
- 500mb of behind the scenes developer sketches, in-development GIFs, screenshot & gifs of the development dog, Max!
